meanings.definition: Thin slices of potato fried until crisp and eaten as a snack.
meanings.sent1: I love snacking on crisps while watching movies.
meanings.sent2: She packed some crisps in her lunchbox for a quick snack.
meanings.sent3: The bag of crisps was empty before I knew it!
meanings.sent4: The sound of crunching crisps filled the room.

meanings.definition: To make something crisp by frying or baking it.
meanings.sent1: She crisps the bacon until it's perfectly cooked.
meanings.sent2: The chef crisps the chicken skin to add texture to the dish.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally crisps the bread a bit too much in the toaster.
meanings.sent4: The leaves crisped in the autumn breeze.
meanings.sent5: The sun crisps the edges of the paper.
